title: Hero
description: Full-width hero section for landing pages - THE MOST IMPORTANT COMPONENT for first impressions and conversion. Supports email capture, social proof, trust signals, and multiple layout variants.

metadata.description: Primary hero section for landing pages with headline, CTA, email capture, social proof, and background media support. First impression component - 70% of visitors decide to stay or leave based on hero section quality.

accessibility.focusManagement: All interactive elements (buttons, inputs) are keyboard accessible with visible focus states
accessibility.colorContrast: 4.5:1 minimum for all text, overlay gradients ensure readability on background images

responsive.mobileBehavior: Content stacks vertically, images appear above text, CTAs remain above fold

metadata.typicalUseCase: Primary hero section for landing pages, product pages, and marketing sites. First component users see - critical for conversion.

marketingContext.conversionOptimization: 5-second rule: Users decide to stay or leave within 5 seconds. Email capture is #1 conversion goal for SaaS/marketing sites.
marketingContext.socialProofImpact: 42% trust increase when recognizable logos appear above the fold (Nielsen Norman Group)
marketingContext.copyGuidelines: Benefit-focused headlines convert 90% better than feature-focused. Use first-person CTA copy ('Start My Trial' vs 'Start Trial')
marketingContext.emailCaptureROI: Email subscribers are 3x more valuable than social media followers - owned audience vs. rented
marketingContext.visualHierarchy: Eyebrow (context) → Headline (benefit) → Subheading (detail) → CTA (action) → Social proof (trust)

layout.description: Layout style - centered (default), split (text left/image right), split-reverse (image left/text right), full-width

height.description: Height variant - full (100vh), tall (80vh), medium (50vh), compact (auto with large padding), minimal (auto with minimal padding)

overlay.description: Overlay style for image/video backgrounds to ensure text readability

eyebrow.description: Small label text above heading (e.g., 'New Feature', 'Limited Offer', 'Join the Beta')

headline.description: Main heading text (REQUIRED) - should be benefit-focused, not feature-focused. Examples: 'Save 10 Hours Every Week' not 'Automated Scheduling Tool'

headingLevel.description: Semantic heading level (almost always 1 for hero sections)

subheading.description: Supporting text below headline - expands on the main benefit

description.description: Body text explaining the value proposition in more detail

emailCapture.description: Email capture form configuration - #1 conversion goal for SaaS/marketing sites

enabled.description: Show email capture form (replaces CTA buttons when enabled)

buttonText.description: Submit button text - use action-oriented copy

privacyText.description: Privacy notice below form - builds trust

socialProof.description: Logo Grid configuration for social proof - 42% trust increase when visible (Nielsen Norman)

title.description: Section title (e.g., 'Trusted by industry leaders', 'Join 10,000+ companies')

trustSignals.description: Trust signal elements (customer count, ratings, awards, certifications)

media.description: Hero media for split layouts (image/video showcase)

alt.description: Alt text for images (required for accessibility)

muted.description: Mute video (must be true for autoplay)

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

landmarkLabel.description: Landmark label for section (referenced by aria-labelledby)
